00247     class split_sorter {
00248     public:
00250         explicit split_sorter() { }
00251 
00253         int operator()(const Split& e1, const Split& e2) const {
00254             return e1.pos < e2.pos;
00255         }
00256     };
00257

00262     class split_by_pos_finder {
00263     public:
00265         explicit split_by_pos_finder(SUMOReal pos)
00266             : myPosition(pos) { }
00267 
00269         bool operator()(const Split& e) {
00270             return e.pos == myPosition;
00271         }
00272 
00273     private:
00275         SUMOReal myPosition;
00276 
00277     };
